As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may tap
any number of untapped Angels or Nephilim you control. This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature tapped this way.
Flying, vigilance
When Empyrean Scholar enters, each creature tapped to pay this spell’s additional cost becomes a 4/4 Angel creature with flying and vigilance. [i](This effect lasts indefinitely.)[/i]
